title: Jewelers block insurance (stock, transit, exhibitions)
dataVerified: Jeweler/owner, inventory value, transit details, vault/safe requirements
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake jewelers block insurance. Domain binding verifies insurer. High inventory values ($10M-$500M for major jewelers). Security requirements verification. Trade show exhibition coverage. Consignment insurance.
